mapper.update:
update tbl_order
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_description = #{orderDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_number = #{totalNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
purcharse_time = #{purcharseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
set_meal = #{setMeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_order_no = #{payOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_order set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_description = #{orderDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_number = #{totalNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, purcharse_time = #{purcharseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, set_meal = #{setMeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_order_no = #{payOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select oid, create_time, create_by, order_description, total_number, total_price, purcharse_time, receive_time, order_status, pay_status, o.sid, p.color as color, ps.set_meal as set_meal, pay_order_no from tbl_order o join tbl_product_color p on p.cid = o.color join tbl_product_set_meal ps on ps.sid = o.set_meal order by create_time desc
